content: Hello friends, these are unprecedented times in the DeFi/Crypto space with the arrest of Tornado Cash dev. DeFi needs privacy in order to progress forward...without it Governments will destroy everything we are building. We will all be tracked, censored and extorted. Technology like Railgun is needed more than ever.What is Railgun?Railgun is the worlds first layer 1 EVM-capable zk-SNARK privacy protocol. It enables incredible private-DeFi functionality on-the-go via the Railway app (available in android and iOS store or its web app). You can start building a shielded balance in an 0zk address on layer 1 Ethereum today with all of your favorite ERC-20 tokens. Head over to https://app.railway.xyz/ to test it out yourself.Railgun v2 is about to launch soon, if you'd like to participate in the setup ceremony feel free to follow these instructions! :Anyone can participate. All you need is a browser and an internet connection.Head over to https://ceremony.railgun.orgYou can sign in with Twitter or GitHub, then click run.It will take about an hour, possibly more. All you have to do is leave your browser open until it's complete. If you have to stop thatâ€™s ok; you can resume by signing in with the same account.Once complete, the site will say so and show you the hash of your transcript. The transcript consists of all the hashes of your contributions, allowing you to attest to all 54 contributions with one hash (use the Twitter button, please).This hash will also be shown on your contributor page, which may be "view"ed from the contributors listRailgun is using the stage 1 contribution set from the #Zcash Perpetual Powers of Tau ceremony. A big thank you to @weijie_eth and all of the original ZKP researchers for making this possible.Your participation is most appreciated! The goal is OVER 100 different people contributing so get your friends to contribute and Tweet.https://twitter.com/RAILGUN_Projecthttps://twitter.com/Railway_xyz
